title: error
name: error
description:
Enables the display of customized HTML pages when errors occur. This lets you maintain a
  consistent look and feel within your application, even when errors occur.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of error that the custom error page handles.

attributes.name: Template
attributes.description: The relative path to the custom error page.

attributes.name: mailTo
attributes.description:
The e-mail address of the administrator to notify of the error. The value
	is available to your custom error page in the MailTo property of the error object.

attributes.name: exception
attributes.description: Type of exception. Required if type = "exception" or "monitor".
